name: VerticalResponse
description: VerticalResponse Inc. provides a full suite of Web-based, self-service marketing solutions including email marketing, social media, event marketing, direct mail and online surveys. Its mission is to empower businesses and non-profit organizations to easily and affordably create, share and analyze their own marketing campaigns. Users can benefit from a wide variety of features including more than 700 free email marketing templates; the ability to share their content over social media networks; and robust reporting so that they can understand campaign success.
